interface.name: org.umlfri.api.fileTypes.FileType
interface.documentation: Represents one file type managed by some addon.

property.name: description
property.documentation: Short description of the file type.

property.name: importEnabled
property.documentation: True, if import is enabled for the file type.

property.name: exportEnabled
property.documentation: True, if import is enabled for the file type.

method.name: addExtension
method.documentation: Associates the given extension with the file type.

event.name: importHandler
event.documentation: Handler for importing files of this type.

event.name: exportHandler
event.documentation: Handler for export files of this type.
